Directions: In a large mixing bowl, cream butter, oil and sugars. Beat in egg and vanilla. Combine flour, oats, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; gradually add to the creamed mixture. Combine milk and vinegar; add to creamed mixture. Stir in chocolate chips and potato chips. Drop by tablespoonfuls 2 in. apart onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown. Remove to wire racks to cool.
